content:
Hi All,
The HAPI FHIR 5.3.0 release webinar will be this Thursday, February 18 at 10:00am Eastern (Toronto) time.

The codename for this release is Odyssey. This is a big one, quite a few great new features have made it in (enough that I'm stressing a bit about how we're going to fit it all into 30 mins! :) )

Details on where to find the webinar can be found here: https://www.smilecdr.com/quarterly-product-release-webinar-reminder

As always, we'll be posting a link to the recording shortly afterward so don't worry if this time doesn't work for you.

Cheers,James
